ConfigurationOption.Value: select wo.wonum, wo.failurecode, (select failurecode from failurereport where wonum = wo.wonum and siteid = wo.siteid and type = 'PROBLEM') problemcode, (select failurecode from failurereport where wonum = wo.wonum and siteid = wo.siteid and type = 'CAUSE') causecode, (select failurecode from failurereport where wonum = wo.wonum and siteid = wo.siteid and type = 'REMEDY') remedycode, fr.description, wo.siteid, wo.workorderid from workorder wo left outer join failureremark fr on wo.wonum = fr.wonum and wo.siteid = fr.siteid

Struct._value: := query( "Failure Codes", "Failure List", " 'Failure Code' = ${Cause Code} and Parent = ${PROBLEM_LIST}" )
:= query( "Failure Codes", "Failure List", " 'Failure Code' = ${Failure Code} and Parent is null" )
:= query( "Failure Codes", "Failure List", " 'Failure Code' = ${Problem Code} and Parent = ${FAILURE_LIST}" )
